title: Second phase of school first term commences on Monday
body_lines: The second phase of the first term of all grades of government schools and government-approved private schools will commence on the 6th of June (Monday), the Ministry of Education says.
The first phase of the first term of schools came to an end on the 19th of May.
Schools remained closed in view of 2021 (2022) G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination held from May 23 – June 01.
